description.en: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the second Lunar Year. The second Lunar Year is dedicated to the Bull.
description.ar: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the second Lunar Year. The second Lunar Year is dedicated to the Bull.
description.br: Uma capa lindamente trabalhada e adornada com um símbolo que representa o segundo Ano Lunar. O segundo Ano Lunar é dedicado ao Boi.
description.cns: 一件做工精美的披风。披风的图案展示的是第二地支丑，该年的生肖为牛。
description.de: Trägt das Symbol zum Jahr des Büffels aus dem chinesischen Tierkreiszeichen. Erhöht die Stärke und Ausdauer um vier.
description.fi: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the second Lunar Year. The second Lunar Year is dedicated to the Bull.
description.fil: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the second Lunar Year. The second Lunar Year is dedicated to the Bull.
description.fr: Une cape de belle confection, décorée d'un symbole représentant la seconde Année Lunaire, dédiée au Taureau.
description.id: Cloak yang dibuat dengan indah dihiasi dengan simbol yang mewakili Tahun Imlek kedua. Tahun Imlek kedua didedikasikan untuk Banteng.
description.it: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the second Lunar Year. The second Lunar Year is dedicated to the Bull.
description.jp: 2番目の月の年を表すシンボルで飾られた美しく細工されたマント。2番目の旧正月は牛に捧げられます。
description.kr: 음력 2 년을 상징하는 상징으로 장식 된 아름답게 제작 된 망토. 두 번째 음력은 황소에게 헌정됩니다.
description.nl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the second Lunar Year. The second Lunar Year is dedicated to the Bull.
description.pl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the second Lunar Year. The second Lunar Year is dedicated to the Bull.
description.ru: Красивый плащ с символом второго года китайского календаря - быком.
description.sp: Una capa bellamente elaborada adornada con un símbolo que representa el segundo Año Lunar. El segundo Año Lunar está dedicado al Toro.
description.sw: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the second Lunar Year. The second Lunar Year is dedicated to the Bull.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมที่ประดิษฐ์ขึ้นอย่างสวยงามประดับด้วยสัญลักษณ์ที่แสดงถึงปีจันทรคติที่สอง ปีจันทรคติที่สองอุทิศให้กับกระทิง
description.tw: 象徵農曆生肖牛的斗篷
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng được làm thủ công đẹp mắt với biểu tượng tượng trưng cho Tết thứ hai. Mùng 2 Tết được dành riêng cho con Bò.
